actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Workforce.

official_title: Recognizing the 75th anniversary of The Arc of the United States, a leading organization promoting and protecting the civil and human rights of people with intellectual and developmental disabilities and actively supporting their full inclusion and participation in the community throughout their lifetimes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
